channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Greetings from Jaffa, Israel, where a salon is a welcoming space for Palestinians and Jews
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: In the snow, these salamanders get supercool
item.description: Blue spotted salamanders have been seen walking across snow and new research suggests how they get by in the cold.

item.title: Ho Ho No! Santa pulled over for speeding in Ohio
item.description: Santa is speeding through his Christmas deliveries, but a sheriff had to stop him for "flying a little too fast".

item.title: UK social media campaigners among five denied US visas
item.description: The Trump administration bans five people who have called for tech regulation from entering the country.

item.title: Zelensky moves towards demilitarised zones in latest peace plan for Ukraine
item.description: On the key question of Ukraine's eastern Donbas, Zelensky says a "free economic zone" is a potential option.

item.title: Watch: Huge fireball as tanker explodes on Italian motorway
